seo_block.p1: Hairnova AI automatically recognizes your face shape and proportions, recommending hairstyles and colors that better suit your facial structure, helping you see the results before making a real change.
seo_block.p2: No download, no registration required. Just upload a photo to start the experience.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.q1: How does AI determine my face shape?
faq.a1: Our AI analyzes 68 key facial landmarks including jawline curvature, forehead width, and facial proportions to accurately identify your face shape (Oval, Round, Square, etc.) and calculate the best hairstyle ratios.
faq.q2: What hairstyles suit a round face?
faq.a2: For round faces, we generally recommend styles that add height at the top or use side lines to create an elongating effect, such as voluminous waves or side-parted cuts. Our AI provides more tailored advice based on your specific features.
faq.q3: What if I don't like the recommended hairstyles?
faq.a3: AI recommendations are optimized choices based on proportions, but you can always try other styles manually in our 'Hairstyle Candidate Library'. AI also marks 'Tryable' styles for you to explore.
faq.q4: Will the AI change my facial features?
faq.a4: Definitely not. Our technology uses high-precision facial masking to only modify hair and color. Your original eyes, nose, and mouth remain 100% authentic and unchanged.
faq.a5: Our recommendations are based on millions of facial and hair data points. While style is subjective, the AI suggestions follow structural balance principles, providing highly valuable scientific decision-making advice.
faq.q6: Is Hairnova AI Advisor free to use?
faq.a6: Yes, we offer free trial credits for every user. You can experience the core AI face shape recognition and hairstyle recommendation features without any initial cost.
faq.q7: Does the tool support both men and women?
faq.a7: Absolutely. We have dedicated AI models optimized for both male and female hair textures and facial contours, supporting over 500 styles across business, casual, and trendy categories.
faq.q8: Do you store or save my photos?
faq.a8: We prioritize your privacy. All photos are processed through encrypted channels and deleted immediately from server cache after generation, following a 'Generate-and-Destroy' policy.

what_is.title: What Is Hairnova AI?
what_is.description: Hairnova AI lets you virtually try different hairstyles online. By uploading a photo, the AI analyzes your face and hair area, then applies new hairstyles and colors without changing your facial features.
what_is.card3_desc: Preview multiple hairstyles, lengths, and colors
